root.name: Caesar's Palace Advance: Millenium Gold Edition
root.description: OverviewCaesars Palace Advance: Millenium Gold Edition is a casino game developed by Pipe Dream Interactive and published by Majesco Entertainment for the Game Boy Advance platform.GameplayIn Caesars Palace Advance: Millenium Gold Edition there are six different casino games that can be played in 4 different categories. The goal of the game is to acquire enough money to be able to move on to the VIP area and become the champion of Caesars Palace.Caesars Palace Advance: Millenium Gold Edition features a password save system in which the player can see a password which, when inputted in another play session will allow the player to pick right back up with the same amount of money.For payouts on the Video Poker machines, see the guide.GamesCaesars Palace Advance: Millenium Gold Edition features six different games that can be played, some of which have multiple themes.BlackjackCraps (Under table games)Roulette (Under table games)Video Poker (Under video games)Video Keno (Under video games)Slot Machines
